meanings.definition: The quality or state of being closely and neatly packed together.
meanings.sent1: The compactness of the books on the shelf made it easy to find the one I needed.
meanings.sent2: The compactness of the suitcase allowed me to fit all my clothes for the trip.
meanings.sent3: The compactness of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to put them together.
meanings.sent4: The compactness of the team's defense prevented the opponent from scoring.
meanings.sent5: The compactness of the flower arrangement added elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: The quality of being small in size and occupying little space.
meanings.sent1: The tiny house impressed with its compactness and functionality.
meanings.sent2: The compactness of the phone made it easy to carry in my pocket.
meanings.sent3: The compactness of the kitten made it adorable to watch.
meanings.sent4: The compactness of the jewelry box kept all the pieces organized.
meanings.sent5: The compactness of the car allowed for easy parking in tight spaces.

meanings.definition: The degree to which a substance is compressed or condensed.
meanings.sent1: The compactness of the soil affected the growth of the plants.
meanings.sent2: The compactness of the snow made it perfect for building a snowman.
meanings.sent3: The compactness of the dough made it ideal for shaping into cookies.
meanings.sent4: The compactness of the ice cubes ensured they melted slowly in the drink.
meanings.sent5: The compactness of the mattress provided excellent support for a good night's sleep.
